Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/gap

Function
  1. FProperty gap(num g)
  2. FProperty gap(computedNum cg)
  3. FProperty gap(num h, num v)
  4. FProperty gap(computedNum ch, computedNum cv)
Description Set the gap between figures:
  1. Set the horizontal and vertical gap to g. Equivalent to hgap(g) and vgap(g).
  2. Same as above, but the gap value is computed by a callback cg.
  3. Set the horizontal gap to h and the vertical gap to v. Equivalent to hgap(h) and vgap(v).
  4. Same as the previous one, but the gap values are computed by callback ch and cv.

    Also see hgap and vgap.
